utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay Rach, that muffin and espresso, $4.50. Ross, double latte, $2.75. Chandler, coffee and a scone, $4.25. And Pheebs, herbal tea, $1.25. So, all together that’s $12.75.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This coming from the man who couldn’t split our 80 dollar phone bill in half.

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: How much do I owe you for the muffin and the latte?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh that’s on the house courtesy of Joey Tribbiani.

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Oh great! Well, tell him thanks. And since uh, Joey seems like such a nice guy, maybe we could go on a date sometime?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, he’s not used to women being so forward with him; but uh, I good check with him—He says it’s okay. Great! Thanks! Bye-bye!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Joey, how come our stuff isn’t free?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It will be when you look like that in a tight skirt! This is great! I’m getting more dates than ever!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait a minute, you’re only giving free stuff away to the pretty girls?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah Joey that is so gross!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How about a scone on the house baby?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m pretty.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey does anyone have any gum?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh I do! Oh, y’know what? No. Wait a second. I know it’s in here somewhere.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know what? I’m good! I’m good!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, what are you doing here? Shouldn’t you be at work?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ugh, they sent me home. They said I can’t work if I’m sick.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Ohh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m so sorry you’re sick.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m not sick!! I don’t get sick! Getting sick is for weaklings and for pansies!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey, no one thinks you’re a pansy, but we do think you need a tissue.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I have not been sick in over three years!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m gonna grab you some tissue.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t need a tissue! I’m fine-d!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: When you put a ‘D’ at the end of ‘Fine’ you’re not fine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m fine-d. I’m fine-d! Y’know, it’s a really hard word to say.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes?

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Hi, is Rachel here? I’m her sister.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, Jill!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Oh my God, Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God, introduce us!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: This is Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And you know Monica and Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi Jill.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And that’s Phoebe , and that’s Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, how you doin’?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Don’t!! Honey, what are you doing here?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Which-which sister is this? Is this the spoiled one or that’s bitter?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Daddy cut me off.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Never mind, I got it.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: And y’know what I said to him? "I’m gonna hire a lawyer and I’m gonna sue you and take all your money. Then I’m gonna cut you off!"

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! What did he say?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: That he wouldn’t pay for my lawyer! Then he told me to come here and learn about the value of money from the one daughter he’s actually proud off.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Did you hear that?! My dad’s proud of me! My dad’s proud of me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rach?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah, sorry. Wait honey, so what did you do that made dad cut you off?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Okay, I bought a boat.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You bought a boat?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Yeah but it wasn’t for me, it was for a friend.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Boy did we make friends with the wrong sister!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Jill, honey, I think this is the best thing that could’ve ever happened to you. I mean you needed to get out on your own anyway! And you know when I did it, I-I-I at first I was scared, and look at me now! I’m the only daughter dad is proud of! Okay, well this is, this is what you’re gonna do. You’re gonna get a job, you’re gonna get an apartment, and then I’ll help you and you can stay with us. Right Pheebs, she can stay with us?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Of course, yeah!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Oh, that’s so great! Okay, I’m really gonna do this! I don’t know how to thank you guys.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, I like cards.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you all finished here?

utterance.speaker: Customer
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Okay, here are the tips for this morning. Jen gets 50, 50 for me, and Joey owes eight dollars.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: For all the free food you gave away.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well if it’s free food, how come you’re charging me for it?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: We don’t give anything away unless it’s someone’s birthday.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, what if they came in third in a modeling contest?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sorry!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: I just had the hardest day. Those bags are so heavy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Jill, how did you pay for all this? I thought your dad took away your credit card.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Oh please, I memorized those numbers when I was 15. But look at all the cool make-it-on-my-own stuff I got! This is my "Please, hire me" sweater. And these are my, "Don’t you want to rent me this apartment?" pants.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t think charging new clothes too your dad qualifies as making it on your own.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Oh, Mr. Scientist has to get all technical!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Seriously, I don’t Rachel’s gonna think it’s a good idea.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: So who made her queen of the world?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I would love that job!

utterance.content: Hey! What’s goin’ on?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Jill! Did you shop?!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: No! They did!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, we went shopping!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You went shopping?! What, and then you just came in here and paraded it right under Jill’s nose when you know she’s trying to quit. Wow, you guys are terrible!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sorry Jill.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sorry-sorry Jill.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What’d you get?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh well, all right, I got thank you, I got uh, this y’know "I want a job sweater."

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And, and then I got uh, these are apartment pants.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Apartment pants?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, you never heard of them?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, of course, of course I’ve heard of them! Ross, what did you get?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh? Oh, I got this——this!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: A pajmena?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah! Oh, I-I love this babies!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ross, wants a pajmena?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s a rug.

utterance.content: Jill?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: I’m sorry Rachel, I’m sorry…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, come on! You think that’s gonna work on me?! I invented that!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Right! But, I am sorry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, it’s okay. One little setback is okay, just don’t let it happen again, all right? Now since daddy paid for all this stuff, I should take it all away. But I’m just gonna take the-the pajmena. And the uh, and the uh pants. Y’know what, I’m just gonna take it all away, ‘cause that way you’ll just really learn the lesson. Okay? All righty, I’m gonna run a couple of errands and I will see you at dinner.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: She took all my stuff.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. Everything but, the little blue one.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: That’s the best one! Oh my God, thank you so much!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well. Hey…

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Oh my gosh, that was so lame. Like a pajmena could be a rug!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah, how about you and the, "I’m sorry!"

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Shut up! I did not sound like that at all!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What about, what about when I said y’know about the apartment pants, how dumb was I?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Were you this cute in high school?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh stop.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: No you stop!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, you stop!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: You stop!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay-okay, why don’t I sit here and you’ll both stop it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, so what do you, what do you want to do? Let’s do something crazy!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know, let’s rest and drink lots of fluids.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I’ll rest. But y’know if I’m going to bed, then you’re coming with me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That would be impossible to resist if you weren’t all drippy here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you saying that you don’t wanna get with this?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I don’t you should say that even when you’re healthy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Don’t take this personally okay? It’s just that I just can’t have sex with a sick person.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m with you Chandler! I mean I can’t have sex with a sick person either, that’s disgusting! But I’m not sick! Let me prove it to you. We are two healthy people in the pribe of libe.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s the thing, see I would like to stay in the pribe of mwha-ah-libe.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What’s up?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, I think there’s something you should maybe know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, it’d better not be about the apartment pants, because I just pitched the idea to my boss at Ralph Lauren and she loved it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No. No. It’s just I was umm, I was with Ross and Jill after you left and umm, I’m pretty sure I saw a little spark between them.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah I mean it’s probably nothing, but I just wanted to warn you that there might be something there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: With Ross and Jill?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: With Ross and my sister?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: With my sister Jill and my ex-boyfriend Ross?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh there is no way.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay then.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! I can not believe that! I mean I don’t really like it when Ross goes out with anyone, but my sister isn’t that like incest or something?! Oh my God, and they’re gonna have sex! Oh! Oh no what if he marries her too?! Oh this is just terrible, this is just terrible. And I can’t stop it! I can’t—I don’t own Ross! Y’know? And Jill, she should be able to do whatever it is that she wants to do! And oh my God, I can’t believe Ross is marrying my little sister, this terrible. Oh my God, this is just the worst thing that could have ever happened to me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But great news about the apartment pants, huh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’ll be $3.85.

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: What do you mean? Yesterday you said I was too pretty to pay for stuff!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’s just I can’t because my manager said I… "Happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you. Happy birthday dear Annie…

utterance.content: Amy!

utterance.content: "…Amy! Happy birthday to you!"

utterance.speaker: A Male Customer
utterance.content: Hey, that’s weird, today’s my birthday too!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, not it here it isn’t.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Sorry I’m late, what’s up?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh hi! Y’know, I just wanted to see if there were any leads on the old job front.

utterance.content: Oh no! But I just walked past three sales and I didn’t go in. How strong am I?

utterance.content: That is great. Hey, y’know who doesn’t have to job hunt? Ross. He works at the university.

utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh so you know that, you guys talked about that, so you get along, so you think you’re gonna go out?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Me go out with Ross?! No! God no! What would make you think that?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I just, Phoebe, said y’know thought she saw something between you guys.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: No! I mean he’s nice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: He’s the kind of guy you’re friends with, y’know? But he’s not the kind of guy you date. He’s the kind of guy you’d date because you did. Me, not so much.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh not-not so much. Umm, what-what do you, what do you mean is there something wrong with Ross?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Oh no-no-no, he’s just I don’t know, he’s just a little bookish.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are-are you saying he’s a geek?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: You think so too?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! No I, no Ross is not a geek!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Fine, then let’s just say he’s not my type.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What handsome is not your type? Smart? Kind? Good kisser? What those things aren’t on your list? Ross is a great guy! You would be lucky to be with him!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Well okay, if it means that much to you, then I’ll ask him out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no-no-no, no-no-no, that’s not what I meant.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: No! Y’know what Rachel? You’re right, y’know he has been really nice to me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah but, he’s not your type.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Yeah but maybe that’s a good thing. Y’know I’m doing all these different sorts of things, and maybe I should try dating a geek too!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah but, you don’t, you don’t, you don’t want to try to much too fast. Y’know? I mean, you do remember what happened to the little girl that tried to much too fast don’t you?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She-she died Jill.

utterance.content: Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh what is it honey, you need some tea? Some soup? Oh-ohhhh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Calling Dr. Big, Dr. Big to the bed.

utterance.content: Oh Jeez honey, I thought, I thought you were asleep.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How could I be asleep knowing that you were in the next room.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I was asleep. Oh no! No-no honey! Y’know what’s sexy? Layers. Layers are sexy. And blankets are sexy. And oh! Hot water bottles are sexy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on, get into bed! I want to prove to you that I’m not sick! I wanna make you feel, as good as I feel.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Would you please get some rest!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m fine.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "Happy birthday to you!"

utterance.content: You’re paying for that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What? No-no it’s her birthday!

utterance.content: But it really…

utterance.content: You are no longer authorized to distribute birthday muffins.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Damnit!

utterance.content: Rach? Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Did you tell your sister to ask me out?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well yeah…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh wow! I mean, wow! I mean, I-I-I think she’s cute but I-I would never have thought of going out with her, never!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah but after you said it was okay, I figured, "Why not?!"

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh so-so not really never.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I have to say you are a much bigger person than I am. I mean after all we’ve been through, I just—y’know I wish I had a brother to reciprocate. Hey, if you ever want to go out with Monica, you have my blessing.

utterance.content: Oh-ho, and mine!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, I think I’m sick.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really? Struck down in the pribe of libe!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, fine I admit it! I feel terrible! Would you please rub this on my chest?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no-no-no-no-no-no, you are not getting me this way.

utterance.content: Come on! I really need your help!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no-no-no-no!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Fine, I’ll rub it on myself.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.content: So you’re just, kinda rubbing it on yourself?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s nice.

utterance.speaker: Monica

utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Monica

utterance.content: Oh come on you big faker!

utterance.content: Okay, if you really wanna have sex…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.content: Worked like a charm.

utterance.content: Hi Jill!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Rachel.

utterance.content: Yeah I know, and I bet you thought it would be weird. But it’s not!

utterance.content: Why aren’t you home yet?!

utterance.content: Is someone there?

utterance.content: Oh yes, it’s me! Sorry!

utterance.content: What are you doing here?

utterance.content: Ugh, she is a slut!
